name: Vampire Bat - Festival Of The Ghostly Supernatural
name_original: Vampire Bat - Festival Of The Ghostly Supernatural
description:
The Festival of Ghosts is here! Feed the Vampire Bat some blood! Avoid the white crooks or else get spooks! BOO! Enjoy!

- No IAPs, no micro transactions, no crippled gameplay, no data requirements..
- Fly the Bat and feed the blood
- Sale

Have fun!
Enjoy this Halloween Special game.

-From an indie game developer who loves creating.
-Its difficult. And You'll love it.
-Game runs on all iPhones, iPods and iPads running iOS 5.1.1 or higher for wide compatibility
